mapper.select: SELECT user.userID, user.name as leaderName, user.email, team.teamID, team.name as teamName, team.description from user INNER JOIN userteamconn ON user.userID = userteamconn.userID INNER JOIN team on userteamconn.teamID = team.teamID WHERE team.teamID = #{teamID} AND user.userID = team.leader
SELECT COUNT(name) FROM team WHERE name= #{name}

SELECT user.userID, user.name, user.position, user.age, user.height, user.weight, user.profileURL FROM user INNER JOIN userteamconn ON user.userID = userteamconn.userID INNER JOIN team on userteamconn.teamID = team.teamID WHERE team.teamID = #{teamID}
SELECT * FROM team INNER JOIN location ON location.locationID = team.locationID WHERE team.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name},'%')
SELECT * FROM team INNER JOIN location ON location.locationID = team.locationID WHERE location.gu = #{gu}
mapper.update: UPDATE team SET profileURL=#{uniqueFileName} WHERE teamID=#{teamID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM userteamconn WHERE userID = #{userID} AND teamID = #{teamID}
